name: Spicy Chipotle Vegan Tomato Soup
description: This beautifully creamy smoky vegan tomato soup will warm your cold winter nights. You can make it in less than 30 minutes and it's so good!!
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon Primal Kitchen Extra Virgin Olive Oil
1 jar  Primal Roasted Garlic Marinara Sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large heavy-bottomed pot over medium heat. Stir in onions and cook until they begin to brown and caramelize, about 6 minutes. Stir in bell pepper and cook until they have softened, 3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a large heavy-bottomed pot over medium heat. Stir in onions and cook until they begin to brown and caramelize, about 6 minutes. Stir in bell pepper and cook until they have softened, 3 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chipotle pepper and cook for 2 more minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the chipotle pepper and cook for 2 more minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour in the roasted diced tomatoes and bring to a simmer. Pour in the roasted garlic marinara sauce and simmer for 3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour in the roasted diced tomatoes and bring to a simmer. Pour in the roasted garlic marinara sauce and simmer for 3 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour in the vegetable broth and bring everything to a simmer. Simmer for 15 minutes. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour in the vegetable broth and bring everything to a simmer. Simmer for 15 minutes. Season to taste with salt and pepper.

recipeInstructions.text: Process until smooth in the blender or use an immersion blender right in the pot. Serve hot and garnish with almond crema, and chopped cilantro. Pair this with a vegan grilled cheese or sourdough bread fried in butter.
recipeInstructions.name: Process until smooth in the blender or use an immersion blender right in the pot. Serve hot and garnish with almond crema, and chopped cilantro. Pair this with a vegan grilled cheese or sourdough bread fried in butter.

keywords: chipotle recipes, chipotle tomato soup, spicy tomato soup
